nodes.text: Angry Birds Star Wars Character Encyclopedia
Angry Birds Star Wars Character Encyclopedia is a Angry Birds Star Wars book that was published on January 6, 2014 by DK Publishing.
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…a group of desperate rebel birds faced off against the galactic menace: the Empire's Evil Pigtroopers!

Now you can find out everything there is to know about Ham Solo and his fleet of Rebel birds in DK's Angry Birds Star Wars Character Encyclopedia. Featuring fun character profiles packed full of interesting facts about every Angry Birds Star Wars character from Lard Vader and his Pigtroopers to C-3PYolk and R2-EGG2. Dig deeper into the world of Angry Birds Star Wars and learn about the important battles and key locations from the Empire's ultimate weapon, the Pig Star, to the deserts of Tatooine.
